text: "Mockingbird" is a 2005 song by American rapper Eminem and is the fifth single from his fifth studio album Encore (2004). It went to number 4 in the United Kingdom, number 7 in Ireland and Norway, number 8 in New Zealand, number 9 in Australia, number 11 in Denmark and the United States, number 14 in the Czech Republic and Switzerland and number 15 in Germany, number 18 in Austria, number 19 in the Netherlands and number 20 in Belgium and Italy. It deals about his relationship with his daughter and was nominated for an Grammy Award in 2006. Category:2005 songs Category:Eminem songs
title: Mockingbird (song)
